text: The Hyundai Santa Cruz is a four-door compact Pickup truck manufactured and marketed by Hyundai. Released in 2021 for the 2022 model year, it is the first four-door pickup truck offered by Hyundai in the North American market. The Santa Cruz is built on the platform of the Hyundai Tucson crossover SUV and features a unibody chassis design. == History == The concept version of the Santa Cruz was first introduced at the 2015 North American International Auto Show. while The production model debuted in April 2021 and was marketed as a "Sport Adventure Vehicle." The Santa Cruz shares its platform, project code, and dashboard design with the fourth-generation Hyundai Tucson, with the production model being assembled in Montgomery, Alabama. In 2024, Hyundai revealed a facelifted version of the Santa Cruz. == Markets == The Hyundai Santa Cruz is sold only in the United States and Canada. == References == Santa Cruz Category:2020s automobiles Category:Pickup trucks
